body: Don't know 'bout y'all, but this story cannot be less sad. The antepenult page, where the old man is looking at that picture of (what I assume is) him and her before she was taken is just sad. Think about it, you were in love with your gf, and she was taken away, after some years you finally get to have her (fuck her, in other words), but despite that, it feels hollow, empty. Fucking the girl you loved, but realizing she (may) not anymore love you (i.e. you fucked her, but the love was already gone). In my opinion, one, if not the only NTR ero-doujinshi i will remember as being good
